Valuation and Financial Restructuring

Our experts bring value to the table. We turn challenges into opportunity, implementing the best financial and operational solutions.

Book A Free Consultation

Home

Business Valuation and Financial restructuring

Business Valuation services in Dubai is a popular service that allows business owners to estimate the value of their business – this valuation can be used to buy or sell a business, capital restructuring, and any further expansion of business, etc.

Business valuation service is a complete financial analysis performed by qualified professionals with proper credentials. Business owners who look up for low-cost business valuation miss out some unique benefits from a comprehensive valuation analysis and valuation report performed by an expert. These benefits allow business owners to get a fair price and minimize the financial risk in litigation.

How to Price a company?

Business Valuation services in Dubai determines the current worth of a company. There are many techniques used to determine the value. Fair market value is the standard value utilized to calculate the worth of a company.

Fair market value – price at which businesses change between a buyer and seller, having access to all information and without any undue influence, to make an informed decision, Analyst placing value on a company looks at the composition of its capital structure, company’s management, future earnings, and market value of assets.

People estimate the company’s worth by calculating the EBITDA or earnings before interest, taxes, amortization, and depreciation, but it doesn’t take into the business risks, cash flow expectation, debt, and more. So, it’s significant to consider business valuation by a valuation expert. Without estimating the proper or fair price, business owners may sell the business at a lower price than its actual worth. While, considering all the above advantages, business valuation is an excellent investment.

How A & A associates help your business to grow?

Business valuation services in Dubai considers assets, liabilities, income, location, and management as the key drivers in a valuation process. To estimate the value of your business, follow up few business valuation models. These models give a clear picture to understand the worth of your business.

Business valuation models approaches include,

  • Asset-based approach – This approach sums up all the investment. Apply this technique to a corporation serves well, because it will be included in the company sale. While applying this same technique to single owner, it becomes difficult because the asset belongs to same owner and separating them from business and personal use becomes a challenge.
  • Income-based approach – Earning based or income based approach believes that each business’s real value lies in building wealth for the future. Make sure that the future cash flow is determined by examining the records and also, assessing the future financial risk.
  • Market Value approach – This approach compares the value of one business with the similar businesses that have been recently sold. This approach is popular in case of more number of existing competitors in the market.

How Business Valuation Services in Dubai help your business to grow?

  • Business valuation services identify potential options to increase the value of an existing business.
  • Business owners have an accurate knowledge on their business and its market value.
  • Understanding the value of your business, entrepreneurs can develop a long-term plan to increase the business’s market value.
  • Increase profitability by looking at the future prospects.
  • Simplify seamless procedures
  • Organize your important documents

Benefits of financial restructuring services in Dubai

Financial Restructuring is a procedure that simply reshuffles or reorganizes the financial structure of a company which comprises of the equity capital and debt capital.

  • Restructuring reduces the operational cost
  • Improves communication and decision-making
  • Increases operational efficiency

When does a company look for in financial restructuring advisory in UAE?

Few of the start-ups collapse every year, in certain cases, most of the businesses end up in liquidation rather than returning to trade. According to the market conditions and competitive technology, companies find themselves in financial trouble. To avoid this situation, approach financial restructuring services in Dubai to bring back your company from the brink.

Some of the reasons when company looks for a financial restructuring advisory in UAE,

  • Poor competitiveness, when you’re not among the list of market players.
  • Stagnating growth, when you find it impossible to achieve growth
  • Shortage in cash flow
  • Lack of dynamism and responsiveness
  • Increased expenditure with reduced income
  • When businesses are burdened with debt
  • When there is a decline in sales volume

How A&A performs the initial assessment of restructuring a company?

The scope of restructuring can vary a lot! Being one of the popular and leading financial restructuring advisory in UAE, we deliver the best restructuring efforts with short implementation times.

Initially, we go through a test phase, after the test phase, the restructuring is implemented with a stream of continuous cycle of improvements.

Our team of experts plan smart with the following details,

  • Specific and time-bound business objectives
  • Sufficient budget for restructuring
  • Strong internal communication
  • Well-organized team to handle the project

As a next step, measure the results against your requirements and finally, go for timely updations.

Overcome the crisis and enhance your company’s performance! We assure the best financial restructuring services in Dubai!
